class.name: aerial_robot_control/fully_actuated_controller
class.description: controller for fully actuated model (e.g., tilted hex)

class.name: aerial_robot_control/under_actuated_controller
class.description: controller for under actuated model (e.g., quad)

class.name: aerial_robot_control/under_actuated_lqi_controller
class.description: controller for under actuated model (e.g., quad) with LQI controller

class.name: aerial_robot_control/under_actuated_tilted_lqi_controller
class.description: controller for under actuated model (e.g., quad) with LQI Tilted controller

class.name: aerial_robot_control/under_act_body_rate/nmpc_controller
class.description: NMPC controller for quadrotor with body rate model

class.name: aerial_robot_control/nmpc_controller/fix_qd/nmpc
class.description: NMPC controller for quadrotor with full model

class.name: aerial_robot_control/tilt_qd_no_servo_mdl/nmpc_controller
class.description: NMPC controller for beetle with no servo delay model

class.name: aerial_robot_control/nmpc_controller/tilt_qd/servo_nmpc
class.description: NMPC controller for beetle with full model

class.name: aerial_robot_control/nmpc_controller/tilt_qd/servo_nmpc_w_iterm
class.description: NMPC controller for beetle with full model and consider I term to compensate for model error

class.name: aerial_robot_control/nmpc_controller/tilt_qd/servo_nmpc_w_ekf
class.description: NMPC controller for beetle with full model and consider EKF

class.name: aerial_robot_control/nmpc_controller/tilt_qd/servo_nmpc_w_indi
class.description: NMPC controller for beetle with full model and consider INDI

class.name: aerial_robot_control/nmpc_controller/tilt_qd/servo_thrust_nmpc_w_iterm
class.description: NMPC controller for beetle with full model, considering servo and thrust

class.name: aerial_robot_control/nmpc_controller/tilt_qd/servo_thrust_nmpc_w_indi
class.description: NMPC controller for beetle with full model, considering servo and thrust. Use INDI for disturbance rejection.

class.name: aerial_robot_control/nmpc_controller/tilt_bi/2_ord_servo_nmpc
class.description: NMPC controller for tilt bi considering 2-ord servo model
